pages.text: $(l)Experiment Index: $()#49$(br2)$(l)Experiment Proposal: $()Achieve greater magic by extracting the Morbus' Essence. $(br2)$(l)Experiment Results: $()Success.
The pure essence of the $(8)$(l)Morbus Mushroom$(). $()Its catalyst is a $(8)$(l)Wither Skeleton Skull$(). I'm not confident on the meaning of this catalyst as of this moment.
